item.title: Splatoon 3, and the difficulty of creating a healthy metagame
item.description: Introduction During the 11th to 12 of January, the biggest online tournament of Splatoon 3, the 20XX, held its long-awaited fourth edition. The last one having reunited 128 teams from across the globe for a tremendous cash prize of $0USD. Official logo of the 20XX This community event highlights that despite a lack of real support from the game editor, Nintendo, the Splatoon competitive community continues to strive forward since the first iteration of the franchise, back in 2015.
